dct_title_s: New Jersey with sight-seeing guide : happy motoring! / [prepared for] Esso.
dct_description_sm: State road map with tourist features. Title from panel. "© MCMLXI, General Drafting Co., Inc., Convent Station, N.J." "Happy Motoring" is a registered trademark. "Lithographed in U.S.A. W462." LC copy imperfect: Lightly use-worn, lead-pencil annotation on alternate title panel. Includes notes, index of places, indexed descriptive directory to points-of-interest, highway mileage table, and Esso logotypes. Insets: Trenton -- Camden, Philadelphia, and vicinity -- Atlantic City and vicinity -- Relief map of New Jersey. Text, road map of "Northeast New Jersey--issued December 1961" [Newark/New York City metro-area], "Downtown Newark" inset, indexes of golf courses/boat clubs/recreation areas, color illustration, 2 title panels, and publisher's advertisement on verso. "A8."
dct_publisher_sm: Convent Station, N.J. : General Drafting Co., Inc., 1961.
